item.title: jupyter notebook remote setting
item.description:
1. Install jupyter
    See the intruction here.

  2. Generate the jupyter profile jupyter_notebook_config.py in the linux environment
    jupyter notebook --generate-config

  3. Open jupyter_notebook_config.py
    vim ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py

  4. Modify and uncomment the following codes
    c.NotebookApp.ip = ’0.0.0.0’ (for 5.7.0 and later version)
    c.NotebookApp.ip = ’*’ (for the previous version)
    c.NotebookApp.password = ’’
    c.NotebookApp.open_browser = False
    c.NotebookApp.allow_remote_access = True
    c.NotebookApp.port = 8887 (Assign a port)

  5. Execute jupyter notebook
    jupyter notebook

  6. Copy the URL to the local browser

[Reference] 從windows/mac遠端開啟linux環境下的jupyter notebook
